name: Voyage Monitor
desc: After a character deals Break DMG, deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to 100% of the original damage after the attack. When a character's Grit is higher than 30 stack(s), they gain a Shield equal to 50% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s). Also, deal DMG equal to 1200% base DMG and 15 Toughness-Reduction to all enemies, and consume 20 stack(s) of Grit.
